definition: to bend/to curve around/curved/crooked/to wind/to warp
to bend/bent/a bend/a turn (in the road etc)/CL:道[dao4]

sentences.english: When the wind blows , the slender tree bends but never breaks.
sentences.chinese: 起风时，这棵细长的树常弯曲但决不会断。

sentences.english: If flexibility isn’t your strong suit, simply bend your knees to adjust.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的躯体不够灵活，可以弯曲膝部来调整一下。

sentences.english: A lock of dark hair curled across his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 一绺蓬松的黑发弯曲地挂在他的前额上。

sentences.english: The right leg performs knee flexion while theleft knee undergoes knee extension.
sentences.chinese: 右腿膝盖弯曲，左膝进行膝盖拉伸。

sentences.english: Floor bridge. Lie on your back with legs bent and your feet flat on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 背部着地平躺，两腿弯曲，脚平放在地上。

sentences.english: The bending stress is zero for the element at B.
sentences.chinese: 在B处的单元体，弯曲应力为零。

sentences.english: The Hamiltonian solution system is generalized to the Reissner-Mindlin thick plate problems.
sentences.chinese: 将哈密顿求解体系推广应用于薄板弯曲问题。

sentences.english: Bandy legs and fiddle front are objectionable.
sentences.chinese: 弯曲的前腿和提琴前腿都属于缺陷。

sentences.english: Other very important, but more complicated, deformations are bending and torsion.
sentences.chinese: 其他非常重要，但更为复杂的是弯曲形变和扭转形变。

sentences.english: Lie face down on the floor with your elbows bent and your palms next to your shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 脸朝地板向下，肘关节弯曲，手心靠近肩膀。

sentences.english: To bend the arm at the elbow, the muscle at the front of the upper arm has to shorten and bunch up.
sentences.chinese: 要从肘部弯曲手臂，就要收缩上臂正面的肌肉。

sentences.english: Branches may be made straight, but not an old tree.
sentences.chinese: 嫩枝易矫直，老树难弯曲。

sentences.english: This is when a bone is bent and breaks along only 1 side, like a young stick of wood.
sentences.chinese: 当骨头弯曲，且就一侧边折断，如同一根青嫩的枝条。

sentences.english: The ability of the bending and cracking resistance of the steel saw blade was evaluated by bending strength and deflection.
sentences.chinese: 用弯曲强度及挠度评定钢锯条抗弯曲断裂的能力。

sentences.english: The ability of the bending and cracking resistance of the steel saw blade was evaluated by bending strength and deflection.
sentences.chinese: 用弯曲强度及挠度评定钢锯条抗弯曲断裂的能力。

sentences.english: Lie on back, knees bent, feet flat on floor.
sentences.chinese: 仰卧，膝关节弯曲，脚底平贴地面。

definition: to hunch over/to stoop/to arch one's back (upward)
vertical/to erect/to set upright/vertical stroke in Chinese characters/young servant (old)
to draw together/to place side by side (e.g. one's fingers, two halves of a torn sheet of paper etc)
